SELECT br.brno AS brno, br.mno AS mno, br.brtitle AS title, NVL(m.nickname, m.userid) AS writer, TO_CHAR(br.brwrite_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS writeDate, CASE WHEN br.brstatus = 1 THEN '게시' ELSE '숨김' END AS visible FROM BoardReview br JOIN member m ON m.mno = br.mno
(LOWER(br.brtitle) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{q} || '%') OR LOWER(m.nickname) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{q} || '%') OR LOWER(m.userid) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{q} || '%'))
AND br.brstatus = #{status}
ORDER BY br.brno DESC OFFSET #{offset, jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size, jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY

SELECT br.brno AS brno, br.brtitle AS title, br.brcontent AS content, NVL(m.nickname, m.userid) AS writer, TO_CHAR(br.brwrite_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS writeDate, CASE WHEN br.brstatus = 1 THEN '게시' ELSE '숨김' END AS status, br.brdanger AS danger FROM BoardReview br JOIN member m ON m.mno = br.mno WHERE br.brno = #{brno}

SELECT c.cno AS id, c.brccontent AS content, NVL(m.nickname, m.userid) AS writer, TO_CHAR(c.brcwrite_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date FROM BRComment c JOIN member m ON m.mno = c.mno WHERE c.brno = #{brno} ORDER BY c.cno DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit, jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
